hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file_path; case "$file_path" in *.ts|*.tsx|*.js|*.jsx|*.json|*.css|*.md) npx prettier --write "$file_path" ;; esac; }
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file_path; case "$file_path" in *.ts|*.tsx) npx eslint --fix "$file_path" ;; esac; }
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file_path; case "$file_path" in *.ts|*.tsx) npm run type-check ;; esac; }
